name: Collateralised deposits other than repurchase agreements additional encumbered carrying amount
description: Collateralised deposits other than repurchase agreements additional encumbered carrying amount in scenario A simulates the situation in which there is a decrease of the fair value of the encumbered assets that are Collateralised deposits other than repurchase agreements by 30%. This fair value reduction could cause some of the liabilities that are the source of encumbrance to require for more protection and therefore for new assets to be encumbered. In template F 34.00.b the institution needs to report the amount of this additional encumbered assets in the eventuality of scenario A.
